changeSet.author: mmwanje
changeSet.comment: U4X-1024: Create FHIR Patient Identifier System mappings for known exchangeable identifiers
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO fhir_patient_identifier_system ( patient_identifier_type_id, name, url, creator, date_created, retired, uuid ) SELECT patient_identifier_type_id, name, 'http://clientregistry.org/ugandaemr' as url, 1, '2025-04-28 08:43:43', 0, '51a06c80-3df6-11f0-bcbd-bf35c84f3004' FROM patient_identifier_type WHERE uuid = '05a29f94-c0ed-11e2-94be-8c13b969e334' UNION ALL SELECT patient_identifier_type_id, name, 'http://health.go.ug/cr/passport' as url, 1, '2025-04-28 08:43:43', 0, '3c6a626e-3d70-11f0-bcbd-bf35c84f3004' FROM patient_identifier_type WHERE uuid = 'fd76e95a-9faa-42b8-8d88-5954fae77fba' UNION ALL SELECT patient_identifier_type_id, name, 'http://health.go.ug/cr/hin' as url, 1, '2025-04-28 08:43:43', 0, '4d7a626e-3d70-11f0-bcbd-bf35c84f3004' FROM patient_identifier_type WHERE uuid = '4c7d6bb2-c8a6-40d3-b70d-fffc062f3416' UNION ALL SELECT patient_identifier_type_id, name, 'http://health.go.ug/cr/nationalid' as url, 1, '2025-04-28 08:43:43', 0, '5e8a626e-3d70-11f0-bcbd-bf35c84f3004' FROM patient_identifier_type WHERE uuid = 'f0c16a6d-dc5f-4118-a803-616d0075d282' UNION ALL SELECT patient_identifier_type_id, name, 'http://health.go.ug/uic' as url, 1, '2025-06-10 12:31:43', 0, 'f87c46cc-4202-11f0-bed2-4212909f6a37' FROM patient_identifier_type WHERE uuid = '877169c4-92c6-4cc9-bf45-1ab95faea242';
